#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
char ch[100000];
int main()
{
	int t,i,count,sum;
	
	
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%s",ch);
		i=0;
		count=0;
		sum=0;
		while(ch[i]!='\0')
		{
			count++;
			sum+=ch[i];
			i++;
		}
		printf("%c\n",sum/strlen(ch));
	}
	return 0;
}
